name: Scattered Piece of Decarabian's Dream
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but becausethe harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambitionof the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.  He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of thatdream are still mighty.
